title: ExamSecure
subtitle: Platform for conducting remote exams
description: ExamSecure is a platform for conducting cheating free remote examinations with an automated virtual proctoring system that performs face and object detection in real time using the candidates' webcam frames to ensure exam authenticity.

title: GradGoggles
subtitle: Virtual Yearbook & Scrapbook App
description: GradGoggles is a Virtual Yearbook and Scrapbook Platform for the graduating #ClassOf2020, developed as an alternative for the missed graduating ceremonies due to the pandemic. Recently crossed 200 users.

title: rajrajhans.com
subtitle: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio and blog site developed using GatsbyJS, with a focus on speed, SEO and a convenient blogging system developed using MDX.

title: SafePass
subtitle: Simple and Secure Password Management
description: SafePass is a simple and secure password management tool with a Web App and an Android App developed using ReactJS, React Native & Firebase.

title: SpringTodo
subtitle: REST API for a ToDo App
description: A simple REST API for a todo app created using Spring Boot. Intended as a beginner exercise to learn more about the Spring Framework.

title: WeTalk
subtitle: Basic Social Network
description: A Flask based basic social networking website developed using Python, with PostgreSQL used as the DBMS and deployed on Heroku.

title: ResultScrape
subtitle: Web Scraping, Flask API, React Frontend
description: Using ScraPy to scrape a website exploiting a vulnerability in it's authorization system, building an API for that data using Flask and a webapp for that data using ReactJS.

title: Essay Editor Tool (API Integration)
subtitle: Identifies Spelling, Grammar, Punctuation mistakes
description: A tool to analyse your essay and run a spellcheck, grammar and punctuation check. Developed using  publicly available LanguageTool API in PHP.
